# BIS15L-Project
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
library(naniar)

```

```{r}
#Reading the two CSV

longitudinal <- readr::read_csv('data/oasis_longitudinal.csv')
cross_sectional <- readr::read_csv('data/oasis_cross-sectional.csv')


```{r}
#Taking a peek at the data

glimpse(longitudinal)
glimpse(cross_sectional)
```
```{r}
longitudinal %>%
  filter(Visit == 5) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = nWBV, fill = Group)) + geom_histogram(alpha = .7) + facet_wrap(~Group) 
  

longitudinal %>%
  filter(Visit<=3) %>%
  group_by(Visit, Group)%>%
  summarise(mean_weight = mean(nWBV)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Visit, y = mean_weight)) + geom_line() + facet_wrap(~Group) 


#longitudinal %>%
 # filter(Group == "Converted") %>%
#  ggplot(aes(x = Visit, y = nWBV, color = `Subject ID`)) + geom_line() + geom_point()




```

```{r}
longitudinal %>%
  filter(nWBV <= .70) %>%
  group_by(Group) %>%
  count()
  
```
